title: Provided that any ongoing Slum Rehabilitation Scheme where the eligibility of Slum Dwellers is revised and certified in accordance with guidelines contained in Government Resolutions zopudho- 100/C
clause_text: Provided that any ongoing Slum Rehabilitation Scheme where the eligibility of Slum Dwellers is revised and certified in accordance with guidelines contained in Government Resolutions zopudho- 100/C.R.125/14/ zopasu-1, dt 16/05/2015, the scheme parameters shall be revised in accordance with above norms on certification of structural stability from competent Government/ Semi- Government Reputed Technical institutions such as IIT, VJTI etc.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that any ongoing Slum Rehabilitation Scheme where the eligibility of Slum Dwellers is revised and certified in accordance with guidelines contained in Government Resolutions zopudho- 100/C.R.
